snippet: A man convicted of laundering money for the Zetas drug cartel worked with his son and a business associate to try to bribe the judge who handed down his sentence, the authorities said.
abstract: Texas authorities say Franceso Colorado Cessa, man convicted of laundering money for the Zetas drug cartel, worked with his son Francisco Jr and business associate Ramon Segura Flores to try to bribe Federal Judge Sam Sparks, who handed down his sentence; all three have been charged with conspiring to offer a $1.2 million bribe to a federal judge.
lead_paragraph: A man convicted of laundering money for the Zetas drug cartel worked with his son and a business associate to try to bribe the judge who handed down his sentence, the authorities said.

headline.main: Texas: 3 Accused of Trying to Bribe Judge
headline.print_headline: Texas: 3 Accused of Trying To Bribe Judge
